input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: My decision has a direct effect on penguin mood and curly hair. Penguin mood has a direct effect on curly hair. The overall probability of taking the elevator is 15%. The probability of taking the stairs and curly hair is 58%. The probability of taking the elevator and curly hair is 3%. Is the chance of curly hair larger when observing taking the elevator?
